g:HTMLPanel.p: Database Mentor web application is focused on students, that are learning database systems, language SQL. Its main task is tu show students basic functions like statements executing. Also provide easy way to execute functions and procedures that are stored in database system by generated forms. Main benefit is debugger that generates variations from select statement and show students step results. Generation is handled by rules that are provided from application. Each rule has different logic and produce different variations of SQL statement.
